Name: description
Burst Strike: Fires non guided missiles in a ring around the mech.
Repair: Calls in a repair support package.
Bombing Run: Fires non guided missiles in a striaght line in the same direction as the player.
Guided: Fires guided missiles at the nearest targets.
Napalm: Fires non guided missiles carrying napalm, burning the area for a time.
Mines: Deploys mines around the player which explode with deadly force when an enemy is in range.
Smoke: Deploys a tactical smoke screen around the player which causes crawlers to loose sight of the player.
Little Boy: Lauches a destructive tactical nuclear missile.
Fat Man: Lauches a highly destructive tactical nuclear missile which deals damage overtime to the entire map.
Companion: Calls in a drone equiped with a high power minigun.
Orbital: Calls in a drone equiped with a high power energy weapon.

Name: chargeDescription
Napalm: Each charge extends the burn time.
